issue.title: Initial Arrow CPP Implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4?focusedCommentId=15149500) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Here is my initial C++ patch contribution as a git diff. It will patch the code root into `$SOURCE_DIR/cpp` See the commit message for more information about what is contained. Thank you

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4?focusedCommentId=15149569) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I redid this using `git format-patch` rather than `git diff`.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4?focusedCommentId=15149689) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Trying this again. Missed the thirdparty shell scripts the first time (which were excluded by the cpp/.gitignore
